Title: Mahabank Aadhar Loan Scheme - Bank of Maharashtra
URL: https://bankofmaharashtra.bank.in/maha-adhaar-loan
--- Mahabank Aadhar Loan Scheme ---
S.No.

aar-loan
--- Mahabank Aadhar Loan Scheme ---
S.No. | Particulars | Scheme guidelines
SR No.: 1
Particulars: Name of the scheme
Scheme Guidelines: Mahabank Aadhar Loan Scheme
SR No.: 2
Particulars: Purpose of loan
Scheme Guidelines: To meet personal expenses (General Consumption, Medical Expenses, Marriage Ceremony, Funerals, Birth, religious ceremonies, etc.)
SR No.: 3
Particulars: Eligibility
Scheme Guidelines: Central/ State Government/ Municipal Corporation/ PSUs and and Family Pensioners drawing pension from our branches
SR No.: 4
Particulars: Min Annua

from our branches
SR No.: 4
Particulars: Min Annua l Income
Scheme Guidelines: Not applicable
SR No.: 5
Particulars: Maximum Quantum of Finance
Scheme Guidelines: For General Pensioners: Equivalent to 18 months pension subject to maximum of 1.

lent to 18 months pension subject to maximum of 1. Rs. 10.00 Lakhs up to age of 65 Yrs. 2. Rs. 5.00 Lakhs up to age of 70 Yrs. 3. Rs. 3.00 Lakhs up to age of 73 Yrs. For Defence & BOM Staff Pensioners: Equivalent to 36 months pension subject to maximum of 1. Rs.10.00 Lakhs up to age of 65 Yrs. 2. Rs. 7.00 Lakhs up to age of 70 Yrs. 3. Rs. 5.00 Lakhs up to age of 73 Yrs. For Family Pensioners of General, Bom staff & Defence Pensioner: Equivalent to 18 months pension subject to maximum of 1. Rs. 4.00 Lakhs up to age of 65 Yrs. 2. m of 1. Rs. 4.00 Lakhs up to age of 65 Yrs. 2. Rs. 3.00 Lakhs up to age of 70 Yrs. 3. Rs.

3.00 Lakhs up to age of 70 Yrs. 3. Rs. 2.00 Lakhs up to age of 73 Yrs
SR No.: 6
Particulars: Margin
Scheme Guidelines: Nil
SR No.: 7
Particulars: Repayment Period
Scheme Guidelines: 120 EMI, Subject to 75 years of age at loan maturity
SR No.: 8
Particulars: Rate of Interest
Scheme Guidelines: Click here to view the Interest Rate
SR No.: 9
Particulars: Deduction
Scheme Guidelines: Pension upto Rs.12500/- => 40% of gross monthly pension Pension above Rs.12500/-=>50% of gross monthly pension
SR No.: 10
Particulars: Security
Scheme Guidelines: Famil

10
Particulars: Security
Scheme Guidelines: Famil y pension nominee will be taken as co-borrower (mandatory).

nominee will be taken as co-borrower (mandatory). In case there is no beneficiary of family pension or family pensioner who availed Aadhar Loan, an acceptable guarantor having sufficient net worth and drawing salary/ pension from our branch be obtained.

awing salary/ pension from our branch be obtained. For Aadhar Loan to Family pensioner, one acceptable guarantor having sufficient net worth and drawing salary/ pension from our Bank be obtained
SR No.: 11
Particulars: Processing Fee
Scheme Guidelines: 0.50% of the loan amount subject to minimum of Rs.500/- & Maximum Rs 5000/ (exclusive of GST) No Processing Charges for Staff Pensioners.
